com.io7m.jintegers

Class CheckedMath

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.io7m.jintegers.CheckedMath

  • public final class CheckedMath
extends Object
    Checked arithmetic operations: All operations raise ArithmeticException on underflow or overflow.
